entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:13 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
